system.description:
Beginning at 15th level, when you use your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.7vvqy990w8pxatdy]{Indomitable} feature, you may immediately use Prior Tactics without spending exertion (no Attack action or attack to forgo required), its range increases to 50 feet, and you need not choose allies able to hear you.

In addition, you have advantage on saving throws made to resist spells of the compulsion school.
